entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mascouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Assomption 02:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: NNE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 7:58 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 7:58 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 7:58 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
